title: Schema for Radio Transients Observables
description: Dispersion Measure schema used for radio transients

dm.description: Dispersion measure (DM) of the burst, representing the integrated column density of free electrons along the line of sight [pc/cm^3].

dm_error.description: Uncertainity associated with the dispersion measure [pc/cm^3, 1-sigma], with optional asymmetric uncertainty.

dm_gal_ne_2001_max.description: Estimated contribution to the dispersion measure from the Galaxy using the NE2001 model [pc/cm^3].
